data.description: This is a great opportunity to contribute to Nokia’s next generation of AI and machine learning platforms. You will support the development of advanced MLOps, GenAI, and AI/ML systems that enable efficient, scalable, and sustainable model training and inference across diverse environments. Your work will help strengthen Nokia’s ability to deliver high-performance AI services, optimize real-world deployments, and accelerate innovation across cloud, edge, RAN, and emerging intelligent platforms.
